wikipedia_page.main: Sylvia Therese Richardson  is a French/British Bayesian statistician and is currently Professor of Biostatistics and Director of the MRC Biostatistics Unit at the University of Cambridge. In 2021 she became the president of the Royal Statistical Society for the 2021–22 year.

link_mentions.page: List of presidents of the Royal Statistical Society
response: Despite women being elected fellows from 1858, only four have been president of the society. The current president is Sylvia Richardson.
